mashFermentables.notes: For the principal ingredient in keg, bottle or cask ales, Simpsons use top quality UK two-row barley to produce a plump, well-modified malt with good extract and enzymic activity. The versatility of this base malt lends itself to balance hoppy beers or provide a robust malty note to a Traditional Bitter or Belgian-style beer.
mashFermentables.name: Best Pale Ale Malt

mashFermentables.notes: Produces full bodied, golden colored smooth tasting beer.
mashFermentables.name: Vienna Malt
mashFermentables.usedIn: For use in Vienna Beer Style, “Maerzenbier”, “Maibock”, Amber Lager, Golden Ale, and October Beer amongst others at a rate of up to 100%.

mashFermentables.name: Caramalt
mashFermentables.usedIn: Suitable for adding to most beers. 5-20% Enhances Colour and Flavour in Lagers, Golden Ales, Brown Ales, Wheat Beer & Bock
mashFermentables.notes: Simpson's Caramalt is a chewy, sweet taste of Heaven. It contributes golden hued colour enhacement and flavour enrichment from its mild toffee notes in Lagers and Extra Pale Ales. Due to its low colour, it is incredibly versatile and can be used to enhance almost any Beer style that needs a little sweetnes.

mashFermentables.name: Carapils
mashFermentables.notes: As used in Pilsner, “Lagerbier”, alcohol-reduced Beer, Light Beer and Bock Beer amongst others at a rate of up to 10%. Use for foam improvement, improved head retention, fuller body. The lightest of the crystal malts.

mashFermentables.name: Melanoidin Malt
mashFermentables.notes: Used in: Amber Lager, Dark Lager, Ale, Scottish Ale, Amber Ale, Red Ale, Red Coloured Beer, Munich “Salvator”. Up to 20% of grist for improved flavour stability, fullness and rounding of the beer colour also improves red colour of beer.

mashFermentables.name: Munich Malt I
mashFermentables.notes:
Used in Dark Lagers, Dark Beer, Bock Beer, October Beer, Stout, “Schwarzbier”, Brown Ale, Dark Ale and Amber Beer amongst others, at a rate of up to 100%
It has the effect of enhancing  dark beer body and aroma.

sparge.name: 02 NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water (www.ah.nl)

mash.name: 02 NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water (www.ah.nl)

source.name: 02 NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water (www.ah.nl)

total.name: 02 NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water (www.ah.nl)

teaser: This intensely hopped and gushing undead Pale Ale will be one’s only respite after the zombie apocalypse. Created with our marvelous friends in the comic industry.
author: Beer n' BBQ by Larry
name: Three Floyds - Zombie Dust (clone)

yeasts.name: Safale American
yeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.
